Title: One Direction: This Is Us
Overview: "One Direction: This Is Us" is a captivating and intimate all-access look at life on the road for the global music phenomenon. Weaved with stunning live concert footage, this inspiring feature film tells the remarkable story of Niall, Zayn, Liam, Harry and Louis's really like to be One Direction.
Tagline: Experience their lives on the road
Cast: Harry Styles, Niall Horan, Zayn Malik
